attributes.action: Turn off all Road and Street lighting after 23:50 Hrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To Turn off "ALL" street and road lighting after 23:50 Hrs,Or earlier, unless powerd by solar and/or wind power.
This will cut down on Energy/"Poll Tax bills" and light/power pollution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
